dialogueTree.title: Door, Apartment #28: "This door is made of metal and appe..."
dialogueTree.text: This door is made of metal and appears to be reinforced. Someone here really values their security.

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yes?" A handsome young man hums wi..."
links.text: "Yes?" A handsome young man hums with a cigarette in his hand. "Are you looking for me, gendarme?"

links.title: You: "Knock."
links.text: Knock.

links.title: Door, Apartment #28: "No one answers."
links.text: No one answers.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go. There's nothing to do he..."
links.text: "Let's go. There's nothing to do here for us anymore."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go. There's nothing to do he..."
links.text: "Let's go. There's nothing to do here for us anymore."

links.title: Door, Apartment #28: "Nothing do to here anymore..."
links.text: Nothing do to here anymore...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should talk to him." The lieute..."
links.text: "We should talk to him." The lieutenant nods at the man standing right next to the door.

links.title: Logic: "The man you're looking for is stand..."
links.text: The man you're looking for is standing right next to you. You should talk to him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should return tomorrow -- tomor..."
links.text: "We should return tomorrow -- tomorrow at 21.00," the lieutenant reminds you.

links.title: Logic: "Looks like he isn't home. You shoul..."
links.text: Looks like he isn't home. You should come back tomorrow evening, after 21.00.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should return in the evening --..."
links.text: "We should return in the evening -- at 21.00 the earliest."

links.title: Logic: "Looks like he isn't home. You shoul..."
links.text: Looks like he isn't home. You should come back later, after 21.00.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like the young man we're loo..."
links.text: "Looks like the young man we're looking for isn't home. I think our best chance to catch him is in the evening." He looks around, taking in the cold spring air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should return tomorrow after we..."
links.text: "We should return tomorrow after we have finished with our day's work -- how about 21.00, sound good?"

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The smoker on the balcony. This is..."
links.text: "The smoker on the balcony. This is why we're here, right? He might know something about the murder. So, tomorrow 21.00?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Suddenly he's a little worried abou..."
links.text: Suddenly he's a little worried about your memory...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Don't worry, it's (mostly) all stil..."
links.text: Don't worry, it's (mostly) all still here. You can remember things. You *got* this.

links.title: You: ""Sounds good. Tomorrow 21.00.""
links.text: "Sounds good. Tomorrow 21.00."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tomorrow 21.00, right here, apartm..."
links.text: "Tomorrow 21.00, right here, apartment #28." He writes it down into his little notebook. "Good. Let's go."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Damn. Turns out it's quite tricky f..."
links.text: Damn. Turns out it's quite tricky finding someone in a big apartment building... Don't worry. You'll get him!

links.title: Logic: "Remember: tomorrow. He's *probably*..."
links.text: Remember: tomorrow. He's *probably* gone for today.

links.title: You: ""I don't think I can make it.""
links.text: "I don't think I can make it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's alright, we don't have to be..."
links.text: "It's alright, we don't have to be here 21.00 sharp, I just need to write something down in my notebook." He has already opened the little blue book.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tomorrow evening, right here, apar..."
links.text: "Tomorrow evening, right here, apartment #28. Good. Let's go."

links.title: Logic: "Looks like he isn't home. You shoul..."
links.text: Looks like he isn't home. You should come back tomorrow evening, after 21.00.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like the young man we're loo..."
links.text: "Looks like the young man we're looking for isn't home. I think our best chance to catch him is in the evening." He looks around, taking in the cold spring air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should return tonight after we..."
links.text: "We should return tonight after we have finished with our day's work -- how about 21.00, sound good?"

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The smoker on the balcony. This is..."
links.text: "The smoker on the balcony. This is why we're here, right? He might know something about the murder. So, tonight at 21.00?"

links.title: You: ""Sounds good. Tonight at 21.00.""
links.text: "Sounds good. Tonight at 21.00."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tonight at 21.00, right here, apar..."
links.text: "Tonight at 21.00, right here, apartment #28." He writes it down into his little notebook. "Good. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""I don't think I can make it.""
links.text: "I don't think I can make it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's alright, we don't have to be..."
links.text: "It's alright, we don't have to be here 21.00 sharp, I just need to write something down in my notebook." He has already opened the little blue book.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tonight, right here, apartment #28..."
links.text: "Tonight, right here, apartment #28. Good. Let's go."

links.title: Logic: "Looks like he isn't home. You shoul..."
links.text: Looks like he isn't home. You should come back later, after 21.00.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's see if anyone's home. Knock..."
links.text: "Let's see if anyone's home. Knock on the door."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Number twenty eight... This is wher..."
links.text: Number twenty eight... This is where the cleaning lady said the smoker on the balcony lives.
